comments.comment:
Janadhimathi thumani, kalin thibuna aanduwa yalith warak path kara obage aathma garuthwaya rakaganna....... Oba path kala  agamathi Mahinda Rajapaksa ha amathi mandalaya thaawaakalikawa paalanaya kireemen Adhikaranayen waarana niyogayakin athhituwa atha, (wiyasthaawata anukulawa.) Eeta wiruddawa mahinda mahathaya adhikaranayata abiyaachanayak idiripath kara atha. Eheth Idhiriyatath elesama dun theenduwa wenas wenne naha kiyala hithanawa. Rate neethiyak tbibenawa. Neethiyata anuwai adhikaranayen katayuthu kara aththey. Ada rate minissu me ratata monawain monawa waida kiyala bohoma noiwasilimathwa balagena innawa. Rate kolahaalayak, ley wagirim sidda novi oba gath theenduwa wenas kara gaththoth hondai. Kalin thibuna aanduwata rata palanaya karanna ida deela pawkaarakamen midenna, thawa kaalayak yaamata kalin ikmanin oba gath theenduwa bala rahitha kara gazatte magin ratata niwedhanaya karanna. Dawasin dawasa rate aarthikaya kadawatenawa. Thaamath parakku natha, obata  theenduwa wenas kara gatha hakiy. Mahindage pohttuwa aya (S.L.F.P. ) (S.L.N.A. )nowai obawa janaadhipathi karanna.chandaya dunne. U.N.P. J.V.P.  anikuth  Demala Paksha, Muslim congress, saha NOVA. paksha ayage chanda walin thama obawa janadhipathi keruwe. Obage hardha saakshiyath eay bawa hondin dannawa. Api marila ipadune naha, oba chanda kaalayedhi vedikaawal gaane kiyapu kathaawal, apata thaamath mathakai, Mahinda mahathaya janadhipathi wunothin obath obey pauley ayath (adi hayak polawe yata wala damanawa kiwwa.) Ehema ayath samaga neada oba ada ekathu wela inney. Kisima kenek nosithu lesa oba eka mohothakin rate paalanaya wenas kala harima haashyajanakai. Mohothakatawath  obata chandaya dun janathaawa gana sithuwada? hamowama paawa dunna. Mona hithakinda ehema keley...... Yalith wathaawak  janadhipathi wenna idiripath wunoth  ilanga chandayedhi oba aniwaarayen paradenawa paradenawaamai!!!!   Manda janathawa aayenam rawatanna baha. Ra wetuna wale dawaalata watenne naha. Min passe obawa wiswaasa karanneth naha....??? Ayyo Sirisena!!! Kelagaththa neada wade!. Oba path kala Mahinda mahathaya, pohottuwe nayakaya ohugema Sahodharayekwa thama ilanga janadhipathi chandayedhi path karanne.. Obata anichchawatha sangkaarai!!! Oba mahinda mahathayaage gateyta ahuwuna......... Api oba gena monatharam wiswaasayakin hitiye, eka mohothakin namath, gaurwayath saha wiswaasayath paludu kara gaththa.... 
Hithaaganna mahinda mahathayage hitha yata obagana wairayak misa kiseema anukampaawak natha! Ohuwa agamathi kalaata. Alu yata gindara thibenawa wage Kawadaawath obata ohugen anukampaawak labenne naha. Ohuge chaatubaswalata oba rawatuna. Obata wadaa  Mahinda mathaya siya waarayak hondai kiyala hithenawa, wiswasa karanna puluwan. Obata wadiya ohuwa wiswaasa kala hakiy.
comments.author: Mohammed Muzaahir

comments.comment: nila wadakata umba japan giya giya nam ganiwa ekkan giye monatada ..owath ape salli ban..umbala sapa gaththa witharai...umbalath sapa aran rate minissuntath sapa dunna nam anna apita nikan inna thibba,,,umbala ema ithuwe nane,,umbalata thawa duratath pae chande na..umbalata chande dena ewun moda ralak...meke barapathala kama therenne nathi gon ralak ...
comments.author: ajith lakmal

comments.comment: meya ari wadagath maththayek kiyalai ithe..meyage puthage case eka koma ari salli walin wa gaththa....meya me baila gaanna enawa...umbawa balen ussan yanna giye nane maithri...umbata katha kala ....eka waraddak nemei....umbata witharak da..anith untath handa gala thiyenne....umbala jkee denek ta handa gala athida..nikan sudda wanthayo wenna adanawa mun..wasiyata oiya  umbala...kaiwaru noga chandayak thiyapan. umbala paradai.... eyage meyage dewal  kiya kiya itiya misak umbala ,ranil,,umbalage ewun monada ratata kale me awurudu thuna marata..monawath na..dan kiyanawa umbalage adara okkoma kapune maithri karapu wade nisalu..yako kalin karapu nathi umbala dan adara aran monada dan na adanna yanne ..nikan palayan yako boru nokiya.....apita mona handuwa wath wadak na..minissunta wadak wenawa echcharai...umbala umbalage sakku purogannawa,,,anith eka dan meya kiuwa meya japan itiye kiyala a welawe..nila wadakatalu giye...abai ganiwath ekkan geen
comments.author: ajith lakmal
